Method.name: Test
Method.Implementation: do ..Main(1) do ..Main(1) do ..Main(1) do ..Main(2) do ..Main(3) do ..Main(5) do ..Main(10) do ..Main(100) do ..Main(1000) do ..Main(10000)

Method.name: Main
Method.Implementation:
set od=$io set nul="\\.\nul" // /dev/null/ - UNIX open nul use nul
s startA = $NOW() do ..JobA(count) s endA = $NOW() s timeA = $p(endA,",",*) - $p(startA,",",*)
s startB = $NOW() do ..JobB(count) s endB = $NOW() s timeB = $p(endB,",",*) - $p(startB,",",*)
use od close nul
w "Iterations: ",count,! w "Time JobA: ",timeA,! w "Time JobB: ",timeB,! w "JobA takes ",$FN(timeA/timeB*100,"",2) _ "% of JobB time",!,!

Method.name: JobA
JobB

UDLText.name: T
